dt: {bc}a convivial party (as after a banquet in ancient Greece) with music and conversation
{bc}a social gathering at which there is free interchange of ideas
{bc}a formal meeting at which several specialists deliver short addresses on a topic or on related topics {dx}compare {dxt|colloquium||}{/dx}
{bc}a collection of opinions on a subject

et: Latin, from Greek {it}symposion{/it}, from {it}sympinein{/it} to drink together, from {it}syn-{/it} + {it}pinein{/it} to drink {ma}{mat|potable|}{/ma}
shortdef: a convivial party (as after a banquet in ancient Greece) with music and conversation
a social gathering at which there is free interchange of ideas
a formal meeting at which several specialists deliver short addresses on a topic or on related topics
